Part One, ACARS Data Link
In this new series of articles, Direct-TO will take a look at the different types of Data Link systems, starting with an overview of ACARS Datalink... Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Sep2017/ACARSSep17]]>
Service Information Letter Briefing <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Sep2017/SILSep17]]> Speed Constraints Issue Discovered on Honeywell NZ and Epic Aircraft with Autothrottle
Operators of some autothrottle-equipped aircraft reported that the ‘To’ waypoint speed constraint is not honored after switching from manual to automatic (FMS) speed mode... Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Sep2017/SILSep17]]> Everything RNP <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Sep2017/RNPSep17]]> Getting Approval for Performance Based Navigation Operations with Honeywell Avionics
The FAA and other regulatory authorities are now requiring operators to document RNP capabilities in newly issued Ops Spec and LOA templates... Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Sep2017/RNPSep17]]>
